T bdsp::mappings::map_linear_norm_bipolar (const T val_norm, const T out_lo, const T out_hi)
 Maps a bipolar normalized value (-1.0 to 1.0) to a given output range The "lo" bound can be higher than the "hi" bound.

T bdsp::mappings::map_linear_norm (const T val_norm, const T out_lo, const T out_hi)
 Maps a positive normalized value (0.0 to 1.0) to a given output range The "lo" bound can be higher than the "hi" bound.

 Maps a value linearly from an input range to an output range The "lo" bounds can be higher than the "hi" bounds.
